trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de momento da conceção para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: ConnectionsZoneDesigner provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionsZoneDesigner fornece uma representação de tempo de criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlo com um menu para aceder a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>propriedade para comodidade do Programador de página.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: É o estruturador de zona apenas e não suporta o estruturador regiões.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlos utiliza ligações para criar ligações em vez de uma interface de utilizador de arrastar e largar (IU).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>propriedade ambos são apresentados no menu de verbos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, quando selecionado, fornece uma seleção de esquemas de cores.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>caixa de verificação, quando selecionada, apresenta o conteúdo do controlo conforme deverá aparecer no browser; o controlo vai estar em branco até que seja efetuada uma ligação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from ConnectionsZoneDesigner to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: Pode herdar ConnectionsZoneDesigner para suportar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlar tal como acontece com quaisquer outros estruturador do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para alterar a marcação que compõe o controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: Também pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>coleção para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>com um esquema personalizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de automático predefinida formatação esquemas para apresentar o **formatação automática** caixa de diálogo para o controlo associado no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoFormats substitui a implementação base para obter uma coleção predefinida que é específica para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: A predefined <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Um predefinidas <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> com um esquema de ConnectionZone predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para representar o controlo no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>ou seja, a marcação para representar o controlo no momento da concepção.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o estruturador para especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controlo associado o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oculta um grupo de propriedades predefinido no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método PreFilterProperties substitui o método principal para ocultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>Propriedades no designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece porque as propriedades em questão não são compostas por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlos e tem, pelo que não sejam relevante.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>do conjunto de propriedades associadas ao controlo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
